channel.title: Google on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Provision cloud resources using Kubernetes CRDs & Terraform

item.title: Google
item.description: Google This guide will show you how to provision a Google Storage Bucket using Kubeform. Examples used in this guide can be found here. Look at the Terraform configuration below: provider "google" { credentials = "json Credential" project = "Project Name" region = "us-central1" }‚èé resource "google_storage_bucket" "test1" { location = "EU" name = "bucket_test1" website = { main_page_suffix = "index.html" not_found_page = "404.html" } } This config creates a Google Storage Bucket.
